name: Oppidan
cleanBio: Undoubtedly one of the fastest rising names in UK Garage, Oppidan has made a name for herself with her distinctive production style blending 2-step with 4x4 NUKG and bass influences. At this relatively early stage of her career she has releases on Night Bass, 24 Garage Girls and Kiwi Rekords, including a remix of Sammy Virji’s hit ‘Shapes’.
